ygData.subject: Re: Road to ruin
ygData.msgSnippet: The Stunticons approach the shore of South Africe. The gravity of the moment is broken by Wildrider s insane cackle. Shut up Speedbreaker yells. Motormaster

The Stunticons approach the shore of South Africe. The gravity of the 
moment is broken by Wildrider's insane cackle. "Shut up" Speedbreaker 
yells. Motormaster then drops Symphony, and dives towards the ground. 
He shifts putting his feet first, then transforms into truck mode, 
landing with a thunderous boom, and peels towards the CF, driving out 
of the crater he left. "Saddly for the Maximals, I'm in a bad mode" 
he mumbles.

Wildrider positions himself under Symphony, and transforms as 
well, "Hhha ha ha, grab on punk" he laughs out. Speedbreaker hits the 
ground, hands first, transforming into his lotus, and follows his 
large and grumpy leader.
